es.ubu.XRayDetector.modelo.ventana

Class VentanaAbstracta

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • es.ubu.XRayDetector.modelo.ventana.VentanaAbstracta
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VentanaAleatoria, VentanaDeslizante, VentanaRegiones

    public abstract class VentanaAbstracta
extends java.lang.Thread
    Superclass of the Strategy pattern that controls the types of windows.
    Author:
    Joaquín Bravo Panadero , Adrián Gonzalez Duarte
    See Also:
    Thread

        Parameters:

        vector180 - Vector with the features for the 180 grades
        vector270 - Vector with the features for the 027 grades

      • getDefecto

        protected boolean getDefecto(ij.ImagePlus img)
        This method checks in the mask if the region of interest analyzed has a colored defect. It returns true if the region has defects. If there is no defects, it returns false.
        Parameters:
        img - mask with colored defects
        Returns:
        true if it has defects, false if not

      • porcentajeVecinosMal

        public boolean porcentajeVecinosMal(ij.ImagePlus img)
        One of the heuristics that determines when a window is faulty. The window is faulty if a percentage of the pixels in the window are faulty.
        Parameters:
        img - Image
        Returns:
        True if this window is faulty, false if not

      • porcentajeVentanaMal

        public boolean porcentajeVentanaMal(ij.ImagePlus img)
        One of the heuristics that determines when a window is faulty. The window is faulty when a percentage of a 3x3 region around the central pixel are faulty.
        Parameters:
        img - Image
        Returns:
        True if this window is faulty, false if not
